channel.title: Black Mesa Soundtrack - similar artists?
channel.description:
Hey guys! I've been playing the mod for a while now and I love its soundtrack, with that awesome mix of electronic and hard rock. Could you guys recommend any other artists whose work sounds/feels similar to Mr Nielsen's, or might otherwise scratch that same itch? Would love to have more of the same :smiley:
(sorry in advance if the topic doesn't belong in this forum…it didn't seem to fit in any of the others!)
Thanks!

item.title: Black Mesa Soundtrack - similar artists?
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Electrorock:
Celldweller
Julien-K
Prodigy

Ambient:
HECQ
Deathprod

Not perfect, but somewhat similar…

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Soundtrack - similar artists?
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
Dotard:

I feel that his style combines HL1+HL2 well + a bit of his own touch into it

^this

e.g.

  • Vortal combat Hl2ep2
    cp violation hl2

Anyway, there’s 90’s sound in it, think at QE1:

the guitar riff starts with 6 scratches and this guitar effect is common in many famous 90’s rock songs:
“smells like teen spirits” - Nirvana
“Creep” - Raiohead
“Enter Sandman” - Metallica

ecc…

Read full topic
